member.name: IMFNetCrossOriginSupport.GetCrossOriginPolicy
member.summary: Returns the client's current cross-origin policy to apply to the download session.
member.param: A value indicating the client's current cross-origin policy to apply to the download session.

member.name: IMFNetCrossOriginSupport.GetSourceOrigin
member.summary: Returns the W3C origin of the HTML5 media element.
member.param: The W3C origin of the HTML5 media element.

member.name: IMFNetCrossOriginSupport.IsSameOrigin
member.summary: Returns true when the specified URL has the same origin as the HTML5 media element.

member.name: IMFNetCrossOriginSupport
member.summary: Implemented by clients that want to enforce a cross origin policy for HTML5 media downloads.
